body:
<!-- Thanks for filing an issue! Before hitting the button, please answer these questions.-->

**Is this a request for help?** (If yes, you should use our troubleshooting guide and community support channels, see http://kubernetes.io/docs/troubleshooting/.): no


**What keywords did you search in Kubernetes issues before filing this one?** (If you have found any duplicates, you should instead reply there.): fluentd timezone time_format

---

**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?** (choose one): BUG REPORT

<!--
If this is a BUG REPORT, please:
  - Fill in as much of the template below as you can.  If you leave out
    information, we can't help you as well.

If this is a FEATURE REQUEST, please:
  - Describe *in detail* the feature/behavior/change you'd like to see.

In both cases, be ready for followup questions, and please respond in a timely
manner.  If we can't reproduce a bug or think a feature already exists, we
might close your issue.  If we're wrong, PLEASE feel free to reopen it and
explain why.
-->

**Kubernetes version** (use `kubectl version`):
```
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"5", GitVersion:"v1.5.2", GitCommit:"08e099554f3c31f6e6f07b448ab3ed78d0520507", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2017-01-12T04:57:25Z", GoVersion:"go1.7.4", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"5", GitVersion:"v1.5.2", GitCommit:"08e099554f3c31f6e6f07b448ab3ed78d0520507", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2017-01-12T04:52:34Z", GoVersion:"go1.7.4", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
```

**What happened**:

Log lines from docker have the wrong timestamp.

**Anything else do we need to know**:

We are building a custom Docker Image for  fluentd/td-agent which is based on your Dockerfile but with some slight changes. One of which is that we set the timezone to something else than UTC. In this case fluentd will produce wrong timestamps for log lines since the [time_format](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/53b43d6f8f505834b95967c5a8804bf401ad01e7/cluster/addons/fluentd-elasticsearch/fluentd-es-image/td-agent.conf#L116) string only includes a simple Z in the end.

Changing the time_format to ```%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%N%Z``` fixed the problem for us.

Of course this is not really a bug in kubernetes but changing the default to the above will probably help others in the future.

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Instrumentation.
labels.name: sig/instrumentation

title: addon: fluentd-elasticsearch, time_format and timezones
